title: 100 Days Wild
overview: Seven strangers are giving up the comforts of the modern world in an attempt to build a self-sustaining colony in the Alaskan wilderness in the 100 Days Wild. The series follows five men and two women as they hone their skills and work together to hunt, gather, and build a shelter over the course of 100 days, before the start of the brutal Alaskan winter.Â
